tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I highly appreciate to Dr. Atul Kumar Garg.
We did visit for knee problem of my mother, knee Replacement surgery done successfully and within one month my mother walks normally,  Doctor's nature is very friendly and calm, we always appreciate to doctor . 
He gives a new life to my mother. I am very happy and satisfied now. I am very thankful to Dr Atul Sir,  

I recommend to everyone for orthopedic problems.. 
Regards 
Pankaj Gupta
Rohini

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr is very attentive n his attention to details n his response to the issue is all great . Heard the details n then prescribes n I liked his soft attitude n behaviour too .
Is also available n responsive in case you message him at a later date which is the best part I liked .
I would recommend a visit to him certainly .
reply_text:
Thanks  MR Vinay 
Your words matter a lot
